name: Chronomat 44 GMT
description: Robust 44mm stainless steel watch with sapphire crystal, automatic movement, multi-time zone tracking, and is water-resistant up to 200 meters.

details.title: Material
details.text: Typically made from stainless steel, with options for 18k rose gold accents, giving it a high-end finish.

details.title: Power Reserve
details.text: Around 70 hours, meaning it can run for more than two days without needing to be wound.

details.title: GMT Hand
details.text: A fourth hand, often in a contrasting color (such as red), is used for the GMT function.

details.title: Sapphire Crystal
details.text: Scratch-resistant and coated for anti-reflective properties, ensuring clear visibility under various lighting conditions.

details.title: Sporty Yet Elegant
details.text: The watch strikes a balance between professional/aviator style and high-end luxury.
